searchPlaceholder: Search for a crime name or location
enterAddress: Add the address by pressing the location icon
noGeolocation: Geolocation is not available in your browser.
Text1: GeoCrimen is a platform that allows citizens to report and visualize crimes anywhere in Colombia. Using heatmap technology, users will be able to observe the location and nature of crimes, which helps raise awareness and foster community safety.
Text2: Our mission is to empower communities with valuable information to make informed decisions about their safety, while facilitating citizen collaboration in crime prevention.
location: Your location could not be obtained. Please enter it manually.

carouselTexts.carouselText3: Visualize risk areas in real time
carouselTexts.carouselText4: Contribute to the safety of your neighborhood

anonymousReports.title: Anonymous Reports
anonymousReports.description: Report incidents without revealing your identity, ensuring your safety and privacy.

heatMap.title: Heat Map
heatMap.description: Visualize areas with high crime rates to make informed decisions.

stats.title: Statistics
stats.description: Access up-to-date data about your community's safety situation.

dataVerification.title: Data Verification
dataVerification.description: Verify the authenticity of reports through ratings by other users.

preciseLocation.title: Precise Location
preciseLocation.description: Report incidents with exact location. Just enable GPS and press the location button.

heatmap_description: Our heatmap uses a color-coded system to indicate risk levels in different areas, allowing you to quickly identify the safest zones and those requiring greater caution.

riskLevels.description: High incidence of homicides and thefts in the area.
Moderate incidence of homicides and thefts in the area.
Low incidence of homicides and thefts in the area.
